title: pashupatim ugram
sahitya:
pashupatim ugram kapAlinam vandE

anupallavi

shashidharam sAmbam shankaram shAshvatam shaNmukha priyatAtam sarvam sabhApatim

caraNam

kalyANasundaram kandarpa sundaram karpUra sundaram kadambavana sundaram
mallikArjunapatim vanamAlipriyakaram mangaLAkaram haram mahEsham harikEsham
